concept.title: Task Topics
concept.shortdesc: Task topics provide clear, step-by-step instructions for completing specific procedures and reducing user errors.

section.title: Use
section.p: Task topics provide clear, step-by-step instructions for completing a procedure. They are best used when guiding users through a specific action, such as installing software, configuring settings, or submitting forms. Tasks reduce user errors by presenting actions in a consistent, predictable way, making them ideal for call centers, onboarding flows, and support documentation.

section.title: User Intent
section.p: "I need to get something done right now."

ul.li: <context>: When and why to perform this task.
Include expected results for complex steps.
Provide specific UI element names and locations.
Use conditional steps for different scenarios.
Test task topics with actual users to identify gaps and ensure clarity.

section.title: Sample XML Code
section.pre: <task id="resetpassword"> <title>Reset Your Password</title> <shortdesc>This procedure resets your account password using email verification.</shortdesc> <taskbody> <steps> <step>Go to the login page and click "Forgot Password".</step> <step>Enter your registered email address.</step> <step>Follow the link sent to your email to set a new password.</step> </steps> <result>Your password is now updated and you can log in.</result> </taskbody> </task>
